Dashboard Analytics Overview

üåä

Dynamic Wave Chart

Real-time engagement visualization with adaptive wave patterns. Wave amplitude reflects current engagement levels, while animation speed corresponds to posting volume. Glowing effects indicate new performance records.

Platform Chart Lines

Interactive status indicators for Instagram (pink) and YouTube (red) autopilot systems. Bar height represents daily post volume configuration, with smooth animations reflecting platform activity and engagement.
